Indian.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a member of one of the races that lived in North, South, and Central America before the Europeans arrived
Indian.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a meal of Indian food, or a restaurant that sells Indian food
Indian.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: Do you fancy going out for an Indian?
Indian.translation[1].definitions[0].def: relating to India or its people
Indian.translation[1].definitions[1].def: relating to the Indians of North, South, and Central America
